item.title: üîç YouTube OSINT: Extract Hidden Intel from Public Videos
item.description:
Pro Tip: Replace with your own banner using Canva

üåê Why YouTube is an OSINT Goldmine

Public videos leak:

  • Employee identities (badges, name tags)
  • Internal tools (visible in screen shares)
  • Geolocation data (embedded in metadata)
  • Deleted content (via archives)

‚ö†Ô∏è Ethical Note: Only analyze publicly available videos of organizations you have permission to investigate.

üõ†Ô∏è Step-by-Step Technique

1. Identify Target Channels

site:youtube.com intitle:"TechCorp" OR "Tech Corp"
